AR 20. The undertaking may specify whether the target addresses shortcomings related to the
Substantial Contribution criteria for Circular Economy as defined in the delegated acts
adopted pursuant to Article 13(2) of Regulation (EU) 2020/852. Where the Do No Significant
Harm (DNSH) criteria for Circular Economy as defined in delegated acts adopted pursuant
